title: Department of Problems of Thermomechanical Processing of Structural Steels

firstPersonCard.name: Babachenko Oleksandr Ivanovych
firstPersonCard.description: Doctor of Technical Sciences, Senior Researcher
firstPersonCard.researchDirection: Development of scientific principles and technological solutions for new processes of producing wheel-tyre steels and railway wheels and tyres, ensuring a high level of their resource. Research on the influence of the structural state and complex of properties of various types of steel rolled products on their operational reliability

items: Development of alloying systems for steels for railway-purpose metal products and technological parameters of deformation and heat treatment, ensuring increased operational durability and reduced production cost.

Development of scientific and technological principles of effective processes for forming the structure and a specified set of properties of bar and shaped rolled products through their thermomechanical strengthening.
Research on the influence of the structural state and complex of properties of various types of steel rolled products on their operational reliability.

staffCards.name: Podolskyi Rostyslav Viacheslavovych
staffCards.researchDirection: Development of a scientifically based complex of technological solutions for the production of railway rails and research of the influence of the structural state on mechanical properties, ensuring high operational stability. Research of the structural state and complex of mechanical properties of products manufactured by additive production methods for use in various operating conditions.

staffCards.name: Filonenko Nataliia Yuriivna
staffCards.description: Candidate of Physical and Mathematical Sciences
staffCards.researchDirection: Establishment of physical regularities of phase transformations and structure formation in alloys and steels during their crystallization from equilibrium and non-equilibrium states, which will allow the development of metal alloys with predictable properties by changing their phase composition and controlling the phase transformations occurring in them. Development of scientific, theoretical and technological principles of the influence of alloy crystallization conditions, taking into account fluctuation processes, on the physical properties of alloys and steels. Research of the mechanism and kinetics of phase transformations in boron-alloyed alloys.

staffCards.name: Uzlov Oleh Volodymyrovych
staffCards.researchDirection: Development of scientific and technological principles of effective processes for forming the structure and a specified set of properties of bar and sheet rolled products through their thermomechanical strengthening. Research of acicular ferrite.

staffCards.name: Dementieva Zhanna Andriivna
staffCards.researchDirection: Research of the features of structure formation during crystallization and thermomechanical treatments of carbon, micro-, low- and alloyed steels. Development of a method for assessing and identifying steel grain size. Development of a method for assessing the degree of deformation processing of rolled products from carbon and low-alloy steels from changes in the parameters of dendritic structure traces.
staffCards.specialization: 05.16.01 – Metal Science and Heat Treatment of Metals

staffCards.name: Puchikov Oleksandr Volodymyrovych
staffCards.researchDirection: Development of scientific and technological principles of effective processes for forming the structure and a specified set of properties of bar and sheet rolled products through their thermomechanical strengthening. Research of acicular ferrite.
staffCards.specialization: 05.16.01 – Metal Science and Heat Treatment of Metals

staffCards.name: Safronov Oleksandr Leonidovych
staffCards.researchDirection: Development of scientific principles and technological solutions for new processes of producing wheel-tyre steels and railway wheels and tyres, ensuring a high level of their resource. Research on the influence of the structural state and complex of properties of various types of steel rolled products on their operational reliability
staffCards.specialization: 05.16.01 – Metal Science and Heat Treatment of Metals

staffCards.name: Sukhoi Andrii Pavlovych
staffCards.researchDirection: Research of the processes of forming the structural state and complex of properties of low-alloy steels during their interrupted cooling and subsequent self-tempering.
staffCards.specialization: 05.16.01 – Metal Science and Heat Treatment of Metals

staffCards.name: Klynova Olha Pylypivna
staffCards.researchDirection: Research of the processes of forming the structural state and complex of properties of low-alloy steels during their interrupted cooling and subsequent self-tempering.
staffCards.specialization: 05.16.01 – Metal Science and Heat Treatment of Metals

staffCards.name: Shpak Olena Adolfivna
staffCards.researchDirection: Development of scientific and technological principles of effective processes for forming the structure and a specified set of properties of bar and sheet rolled products through their thermomechanical strengthening. Research of acicular ferrite.
staffCards.specialization: 05.16.01 – Metal Science and Heat Treatment of Metals

staffCards.name: Kononenko Hanna Andriivna
staffCards.description: Doctor of Technical Sciences, Senior Researcher
staffCards.researchDirection: Improvement of existing and development of new steel grades for the production of railway-purpose metal products, ensuring high wear resistance and increased resistance to thermal influence during operation. Development of theoretical principles on the influence of hot plastic deformation on the formation of the final structure, taking into account the hereditary influence of the primary dendritic-grain structure in comparison with the chemical heterogeneity that arises during crystallization. Development of scientific and technological principles of effective processes for forming the structural state and complex of mechanical properties of products manufactured by additive production methods for use in various operating conditions.

staffCards.name: Safronova Olena Anatoliivna
staffCards.researchDirection: Development of scientific principles and technological solutions for new processes of producing railway axles, research of the influence of the structural state and complex of properties on operational reliability.

staffCards.name: Kimstach Tetiana Volodymyrivna
staffCards.description: Associate Professor, Candidate of Technical Sciences
staffCards.researchDirection: Development of technological solutions for obtaining high-strength heavy plate rolled products for critical applications from economically alloyed steel based on establishing the features of structure formation processes and phase transformations.
staffCards.specialization: 05.16.01 – Metal Science and Heat Treatment of Metals
